 3.3 - INPUT ASSISTANCE
HELP(LEVEL AAA)
On accessible websites...

Context-sensitive help is available. 

These websites...

Help users avoid and correct mistakes.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
 on-line job application 

 Some of the questions may be hard for new job seekers to understand. A help
link next to each question provides instructions and explanations for each
question. 

I still don't really understand
[https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/help.html#examples]

Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.2, W3C World Wide Web Consortium
Recommendation 27 February 2020 (https://www.w3.org/TR/2020/WD-WCAG22-20200227/,
Latest version at https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG22/)

 * Subscribe [https://dwcag.org/#sign-up-section]
 * Share Feedback [https://dwcag.org/#feedback-section]
 * Unsubscribe [https://dwcag.org/unsubscribe]
